member.name: M:ProgrammersBlog.Services.Abstract.ICategoryService.GetCategoryUpdateDtoAsync(System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns the CategoryUpdateDto representation of the category for the given Id parameter
member.param: An integer Id value greater than 0
member.returns: With an asynchronous operation, it returns the result of the operation as a Task in DataResult type.

member.name: M:ProgrammersBlog.Services.Abstract.ICategoryService.AddAsync(ProgrammersBlog.Entities.Dtos.CategoryAddDto,System.String)
member.summary: Adds a new category with the information of the given CategoryAddDto and CreatedByName parameters.
member.param: Category information to be added in categoryAddDto type
member.returns: With an asynchronous operation, the result of the addition operation is returned as Task in DataResult type.
